data.text:
@m_c_marshall I wouldn't call that silly in anyway whatsoever.

But then, I'm the kind of humble-brag who would frame them and then wait patiently so I could bust out a nonchalant "Oh, theeeeese?"
@m_c_marshall Of course you do! Be proud! I own a copy of every bit of press I’ve gotten. The only question is do you buy 12 copies for your mother?

@Markfuller49 I think some of them will - though I’m reluctant to bet on which ones until there’s more data

Hopefully your friend can join a clinical trial and try an experimental treatment ASAP
@m_c_marshall I hope the treatments pan out; a friend is really suffering two years after getting hit.
